title: Get in touch
failed-paragraphs: Hmm... something went wrong. Sorry about that - it's probably my fault.
It's probably easier if you email me directly, it all ends up there anyway!
If you'd prefer to use the form, you can retry by clicking below.
success-paragraphs: Thanks for getting in touch, I'll get back to you as soon as I can.
For now, feel free to keep looking round - if you think of anything else to say you can always resubmit below using the button below.
form-paragraphs: If you're interested, fill in the form below and I'll be sure to get back to you.
Alternatively, you can email me directly or reach out to me on LinkedIn.
name-error: Your name must contain at least 2 characters
message-prompt: Ideally about finding me a job!
message-error: Your message must contain at least 10 characters
